gbw_one_stage_mirror: GBW ≈ (gm/CL)·k where k is mirror ratio from inner 5T core to output devices
Assumes unity-gain operation (β≈1), single dominant pole; cite CL, M1/M2 for gm, and output mirror devices (e.g., M5/M6/M8) for k
ota_rout_high_swing: r_out at vout ≈ r_op || r_on (parallel of PMOS output device and NMOS mirror output device)
Small-signal assumption; cite output PMOS (e.g., M6) and NMOS mirror device (e.g., M8)
